content: looking to keep your feet toasty warm whip up some of these crochet slipper socks using bulky yarn for a quick project techniques you need to know to crochet this pattern include chain single_crochet double_crochet and crochet in the round what you ll need yarn lion brand color made easy or other bulky weight yarn size 5 crochet hook us size i 5 5mm notions yarn needle scissors sock stop optional but recommended for walking on slippery areas finished size to fit ladies size 4-6 7-9 10-12 foot circumference 7 8 8 foot length 8 9 10
